title: Doctors Behind Mifepristone Ban Called ‘Christians’ a Top Threat
description: Leaked documents reveal that the American College of Pediatricians viewed “mainstream medicine” and “nominal Christians” as its opposition.

title: Gary Marcus Used to Call AI Stupid—Now He Calls It Dangerous
description: The former professor's calls for more control over AI have made him a media darling of the ChatGPT era. Some top researchers aren't impressed.

title: The Seabed Empire Funding Britain’s New King
description: The Crown Estate lays claim to vast ocean assets, allowing the royal family to cash in on the booming blue economy.
